commit message:
Add README file for libopac

* Add README file for libopac

* libopac is now available on JCenter

Updated reminder feature

* Create ReminderCheckService and new notification system

* Refactor account item data format
- New classes LentItem and ReservedItem
- use Joda Time LocalDate for dates without time information instead of timestamps

* Fixes and improvements for ReminderCheckService and notifications
including:
- open AccountFragment with the correct account when clicking on notifications
- update alarms after settings changes
- add ability to 'snooze' notifications
- reschedule alarms after reboot
- clear alarms after clicking on 'clear cache'
- warning period selection in days instead of milliseconds
- ...

* Update 'notification_warning' value after updating app

* Generate alarms inside the app

* SyncAccountService: Change sync period depending on if last sync failed

* Bugfixes for reminder service

* Adapt tests to new Account data structure

* Fix API errors

* Settings: Add warning about notifications without WiFi

* Re-show notifications e.g. after reboot or app update

* SyncAccountService: Don't do anything if notifications are disabled

* Improve behavior after settings changes

* Resolve Android Studio warnings
Fixed a problem with SSL3 socket factories
Move obsolete constants from OpacApi to BaseApi
Hotfix for a abuse of a constant
Use EAUDIO icon for MP3 because it is clearer
Disable hostname verification for IP addresses

Open: Plus Edition compatibility (#398)

make parse_result protected and use Document instead of HTML
Added passwordValid flag to account table
Fixed wrong calculation of cover density
Error handling for 'Bitmap is not valid'
Updated cs, ja, el, es and it from Transifex

Replace most of the icons with VectorDrawables (#399)

* Replace a bunch of icons with VectorDrawables

* Replace remaining icons with VectorDrawables
added: WRS Lüneburg, Weißenfels, Werne; fixed: Gladbeck
Added an information dialog for new-reminder
Fixed #382 -- Make barcode scanning more robust against screen rotations
Show upgrade dialog only when notifications are enabled
A black star disguising as a white star sounds pretty dangerous
